Package clueServer

Class Summary
Cards Class semantics and roles:
Cards is to model a deck of cards that is to be distributed out to players.
Dice Class semantics and roles:
The Dice has only one purpose, to act as a traditional 6 sided die for game play by creating a random number between 1 and 6

Information maintenance:
Creation: Dice is created during start up by GameLogic
Deletion: Dice is deleted when the game ends or otherwise terminates
GameBoard Class semantics and roles:
The GameBoard keeps the current state of the game play's board, which includes player locations and the board.
GameLogic Class semantics and roles:
The GameLogic does the high end computations of the more complex problems.
Pieces Class semantics and roles:
Pieces keeps track of player locations throughout the game.
Player Class semantics and roles:
Class that describes a player.
Rooms Class semantics and roles:
Rooms maintains a group of positions for cells that are rooms on the board or are null spaces on the board (around player positions and board middle)

Information maintenance:
Creation: Rooms is created at start up by GameBoard
Deletion: Rooms is deleted when the game has finished or otherwise been terminated.
Server Class semantics and roles:
The Server class represents the top of the server-side class hierarchy.
ServerListener Class semantics and roles:
Class that describes a server listener.
Users Class semantics and roles:
The Users class is responsible for maintaining references to all of the Player objects.
